Dental Intelligence Reseller Partner Program

We pride ourselves on helping intelligently shape the future of dentistry, and we couldn’t do that without our valued partner relationships. Together, we can better the lives of dentists, team members, and patients. Visit our Reseller Program tab to learn more. We appreciate your partnership.

Reseller Program

The Dental Intelligence Reseller Program provides opportunities to partner with a trusted company in the dental space to propel your brand and monetary growth goals. We offer four different packages for our Reseller Partners with varying levels of involvement.

Best for coaches, consultants, and marketing companies looking to understand Dental Intelligence and how to sell and activate new clients.

Perks

  • Preferred Reseller Pricing
  • Annual Growth Reports
  • Premium Support (chat, email, phone)
  • In-App Product Training
  • On-Demand Learning
  • Online Help Center
  • DI Community Access
  • Early Access Monthly Newsletter
  • Swag Box
  • Quarterly Partner Training Webinar
  • Client Snapshots

Best for coaches, consultants, and marketing companies who understand the Dental Intelligence modules and are looking to expand services and reach the new tier minimums in order to receive discounted pricing and gain additional perks.

Perks

Includes All Bronze Tier Perks, PLUS

  • Guest Opportunity on Growth in Dentistry Podcast
  • Business Review Check-Ins from PSM
  • Premium Intellicon Pricing
  • Access to Partner Product Focus Group
  • Access to Partner Success Manager

Best for coaches, consultants, and marketing companies who understand the Dental Intelligence modules can activate clients and are looking to expand services to meet gold tier discounts and gain additional perks.

Perks

Includes All Bronze and Silver Tier Perks, PLUS

  • Featured on DI Website as a Certified Partner
  • Dedicated Partner Success Manager
  • Quarterly Business Review

Best for coaches, consultants, and marketing companies who understand the Dental Intelligence modules can activate clients and are looking to expand services to meet diamond-tier discounts and gain additional perks. 

Perks

Includes All Bronze, Silver, and Gold Tier Perks, PLUS

  • Host an Intellicon Breakout Session
  • DI Executive Sponsor
  • Annual Co-Branded Partner Case Study
  • Participation in Sponsored Events

  • Snapshot

  • License Activation

  • Partner Bundle

  • License Cancellation
